title: Coronavirus: Great apes on lockdown over threat of disease
description: Fears are growing that gorillas, orangutans and others apes could contract the virus.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 It's not known how the virus might affect great apes like gorillas
Great apes have been put on lockdown against the threat of coronavirus.
Gorilla tourism in Africa has been suspended, while sanctuaries for other a… [+3528 chars]
